MVBC doing it for SA

Congratulations to the guys selected to represent South Africa at the resent Quadrangular held at Wembley Stadium.

From left we have Sivuyile "Maloti" Qavane, Thabile "Godfrey" Koti, and Craig "Coach" Daniels.

Well done on this great achievement, and hopefully you guys will have a long fruitful career at national level.

Coach Craig is the assistant coach to the national mens team, which participated in the recent zone 6 qualifiers.
